title: Pete Davidson 'splits from Margaret Qualley' less than two months after confirming romance
text:
Pete Davidson has ended his romance with actress Margaret Qualley, less than two months after confirming the relationship.

The couple have called time on their relationship after first becoming romantically linked back in August, according to Us Weekly.

Pete, 25, and Margaret, 24, still 'remain friends', even though they have gone their separate ways, a source told the publication.

Split: Pete Davidson has ended his short-lived romance with actress Margaret Qualley

Pete and Margaret first got romance rumors started back in August, when it was reported the pair had already been seeing each couple for a couple of months.

'They've been seeing each other for a couple of months and Margaret is really excited about him,' a source told Us Weekly at the time.

Not long after the report emerged, the pair were spotted attending the Seberg premiere at the 76th Venice Film Festival.

The pair made separate appearances on the red carpet, but were reunited inside the screening where they sat just a row apart.

New couple alert! Just a few days later, the pair confirmed their romance when they were pictured holding hands while sightseeing through Venice

Just a few days later, the pair confirmed their romance when they were pictured holding hands while sightseeing through Venice.

The lovebirds looked really into each other while exploring the historic city in early September.

Margaret is the daughter of actress Andie MacDowelll, who also had high praise for the couple.

Famous family: Qualley, pictured July 2019, is the daughter of actress Andie MacDowell

That's amore! The then-couple were spotted leaving a hotel together in Venice, Italy last month

'She has a beautiful relationship with him but I don't want to step on her relationship too much. They have a nice relationship,' Andie told People in late September.

Andie admitted she had yet to meet Pete: 'I FaceTimed with Pete the other day or no, she took a video of me to send to Pete that’s what it was.'

Margaret, who recently appeared in Once Upon A Time In Hollywood, is the youngest of Andie's three children.

Famous romances: Davidson has dated the likes of Ariana Grande and Cazzie Davids over the years (pictured November 2016)

Passionate: Davidson kissed Kate Beckinsale at a hockey game in New York earlier this year

Pete has been linked to a number of stars, including Larry David's daughter Cazzie, who he dated for over two years.

His relationship with Margaret began not long after the end of his four month long relationship with Kate Beckinsale.

Pete moved onto Kate just months after ending an engagement to Ariana Grande.

Splitsville: Davidson and Grande, pictured 2018, became engaged just weeks after beginning to date

Long-term: The actor also dated Larry David's daughter Cazzie for over two years (pictured 2017)

The couple were dating for just a few weeks when they decided to get engaged in June 2018.

But just five months later the couple called off the engagement.

Margaret's dating history, meanwhile, includes reported romances with director Cary Fukunaga, 42, and Nat Wolff.
description: Pete, 25, and Margaret, 24, still 'remain friends', even though they have gone their separate ways, a source told the publication. The couple were first linked back in August.
